long_desc.thetext: It would be nice to have this implemented in qooxdoo: http://extjs.com/deploy/ext-2.0-alpha1/examples/message-box/msg-box.html, all kind of message boxes and notifiers. I think this should be very easy to implement by using qooxdoo.

(In reply to comment #0) > It would be nice to have this implemented in qooxdoo: > http://extjs.com/deploy/ext-2.0-alpha1/examples/message-box/msg-box.html, > all kind of message boxes and notifiers. I think this should be very easy to > implement by using qooxdoo.
The main problem for having something like this is how to achieve the same semantics of Javascript's native alert() and confirm(); is there a way to block inside JS??
Otherwise we'll be facing a hell of parameters.
On the other hand, the quality of visual aspects will be (hopefully) achieved with 0.8.
